tasks.title: Fix Google Ads conversion tracking
tasks.description: Shopify conversion measurement not added to Google Ads. Need to click 'Add' in Shopify Google & YouTube settings.
tasks.details:
ROOT CAUSE: Google & YouTube Shopify app IS connected to Google Ads (399-097-6848) but Shopify conversion measurement was NEVER added. The app detected existing old conversion tracking and didn't auto-add.

WHAT WE FIXED: All 6 legacy 'from adwords' conversion actions demoted from Primary to Secondary. Google Shopping App Purchase is now Primary.

STILL NEEDED: Francisco must click 'Add' button in Shopify ‚Üí Google & YouTube ‚Üí Settings ‚Üí Google Ads section (yellow box) to enable Shopify conversion measurement.

Also need: Promote GA4 purchase to Primary, promote Google Shopping App Begin Checkout to Primary.
tasks.blockedReason: Francisco needs to click 'Add' in Shopify Google & YouTube settings
tasks.benefit: üí∞ WHAT YOU GAIN: Without this, Google Ads has zero conversion data. You cant optimize ads if you dont know which ones make money.
